title: 9/1/12 WW...
body:
And not an S+?

What are you smoking RITO...

This isn't even an S?

replies.body:
You had the 4th lowest damage on your team. You only beat the support in terms of damage. So pretty much you just ran around taking kills without actually doing that much work. Also, your cs wasn't very good. When I jungle I can get over 5 cs/min in a good game. You also didn't purchase any control wards.

That's why you didn't get an S. KDA doesn't mean everything. You have to dominate in every stat, not just one.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-12-22T16:12:23.535+0000)
>
> You had the 4th lowest damage on your team. You only beat the support in terms of damage. So pretty much you just ran around taking kills without actually doing that much work. Also, your cs wasn't very good. When I jungle I can get over 5 cs/min in a good game. You also didn't purchase any control wards.
> 
> That's why you didn't get an S. KDA doesn't mean everything. You have to dominate in every stat, not just one.

You are a complete asshole. That's all there is to your comment... I'd post the replay and show you how every one of those kills was not only my kill but the assists were me not taking the kill, I also tanked the most damage, warded the most, healed the most by over 10k and had the most gold but it's not even worth spending more time talking to you. 

So glad I met a worthless person on these boards.

The truth hurts man.  You didn't deserve an S.  As someone who got an S on 60 different champions last season I think I'd know.  I'm not being an ass, just letting you know why you didn't get an S and what you need to improve on.  If you're too blind and full of yourself to realize that then I'm sorry I wasted my time trying to help you.  And btw, no one's damage is that low and their kills that high unless they just focus on last hitting champions.  The cass literally doubled your damage output.  You will never get an S unless you're at the top of the damage charts even if you're a tank.

Its funny when people who are horrible at the game call you worthless when you actually give them the advice they need.  Oh well, you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=000300000001,timestamp=2016-12-22T22:35:35.709+0000)
>
> The truth hurts man.  You didn't deserve an S.  As someone who got an S on 60 different champions last season I think I'd know.  I'm not being an ass, just letting you know why you didn't get an S and what you need to improve on.  If you're too blind and full of yourself to realize that then I'm sorry I wasted my time trying to help you.  And btw, no one's damage is that low and their kills that high unless they just focus on last hitting champions.  The cass literally doubled your damage output.  You will never get an S unless you're at the top of the damage charts even if you're a tank.
> 
> Its funny when people who are horrible at the game call you worthless when you actually give them the advice they need.  Oh well, you can lead a horse to water but you can't make him drink.

LOL

you're a good troll

That's why everyone is upvoting my post and everyone is downvoting your post.  Kid, you've got a lot of learning to do.  You can either take my advice now and save youself a bunch of time (because I was once in your shoes too) or you can continue to be an ignorant prick and not figure it out for a couple hundred games.  Up to you, I figured I'd just save you the trouble of all that frustration.
another post that focuses purely on kda and how it doesn't solely guarantee S ranks?  weird.

> [{quoted}](name=Chamuel85,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-12-22T14:32:49.529+0000)
>
> another post that focuses purely on kda and how it doesn't solely guarantee S ranks?  weird.

OMG ANOTHER COMMENT THAT HAS ABSOLUTELY NO BASIS IN REALITY AND IS JUST THERE TO TROLL! weird...

No basis in reality eh?  Did you mention anything other than KDA?  *checks* Nope, you didn't.  So looks like:
1) it's a post?  check
2) only mentions kda?  check
3) whines that KDA alone didn't get him an S?  check

looks pretty realistic to me.

You just mad bro.  Calm down that you didn't get an S and figure out the system to actually improve your gameplay instead of just complaining about it.

> [{quoted}](name=Chamuel85,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-22T16:05:56.232+0000)
>
> No basis in reality eh?  Did you mention anything other than KDA?  *checks* Nope, you didn't.  So looks like:
> 1) it's a post?  check
> 2) only mentions kda?  check
> 3) whines that KDA alone didn't get him an S?  check
> 
> looks pretty realistic to me.
> 
> You just mad bro.  Calm down that you didn't get an S and figure out the system to actually improve your gameplay instead of just complaining about it.

Did you ask about it? Did you give a fuck about anything but putting your bullshit spewing into a dumb comment? No? You're 20x more at fault then me. Good day sir.
See?  again, you are just mad.

> [{quoted}](name=Chamuel85,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2016-12-22T16:05:56.232+0000)
>
> No basis in reality eh?  Did you mention anything other than KDA?  *checks* Nope, you didn't.  So looks like:
> 1) it's a post?  check
> 2) only mentions kda?  check
> 3) whines that KDA alone didn't get him an S?  check
> 
> looks pretty realistic to me.
> 
> You just mad bro.  Calm down that you didn't get an S and figure out the system to actually improve your gameplay instead of just complaining about it.

This is just complete fallacy. 

My entire point was to point out the system is complete bullshit and I shouldn't have to "game it" to get an S+. It should fairly accurately show a top player. And in THAT game, on the champ I was playing, I performed near perfect.  The one death was to get us 3 more kills but I probably could have ran and got away.

Just fyi, you game the system by playing complete league of legends.  Not team deathmatch.  It shows that if you think you performed 'near perfect' that you only really talk about your KDA.  *shrugs*  If you think it's fallacy, no one else here really does.  Eh.
CS/Damage matters as well, so that could be it otherwise don't know
Just cs, not damage.
Damage does matter. I often boost my rank to s by just sitting behind baron pit and throwing spells in it
Can Mordekaiser even reach baron from behind the pit? :P
No, but I play Morg/Karma more than morde, and they can.

> [{quoted}](name=Closure,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-22T14:31:47.706+0000)
>
> CS/Damage matters as well, so that could be it otherwise don't know

Normal jungle cs, top dmg, top damage taken... either way, Rito fuckt for this
you didn't get an S+ cuz u suk

> [{quoted}](name=463,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2016-12-22T15:05:35.853+0000)
>
> you didn't get an S+ cuz u suk

Guaranteed I'm at least better than you.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 

You do realize that guy is diamond right?  And you do realize how dumb that comment makes you look right?

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=000200000000,timestamp=2016-12-22T22:37:54.096+0000)
>
> {{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} 
> 
> You do realize that guy is diamond right?  And you do realize how dumb that comment makes you look right?

Couldn't give a fuck what rank he is, he's a rude asshole.

Him being a rude asshole does not mean that you can beat him.  You said that you are better than him.  To think that you are better than a diamond player is a level of delusion I have not seen in a long time.

You are making yourself look more and more foolish with each post.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=00020000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-22T22:50:07.979+0000)
>
> Him being a rude asshole does not mean that you can beat him.  You said that you are better than him.  To think that you are better than a diamond player is a level of delusion I have not seen in a long time.
> 
> You are making yourself look more and more foolish with each post.

You are just being a dick. For no reason. Just like he is. Good bye.

You don't seem to understand the difference between someone being honest with you and someone being a dick.  Would you prefer I lie to you and be like "yeah! You can definitely beat a diamond player!"

Honestly, what was your thought process making this post?  Did you really think people were going to be like "wow!  You're an amazing Warwick.  You definitely deserved an S!  Teach me your ways senpai!"  Wake up, this is real life.  If you come in with the straight up arrogance to think you deserve an S when you ONLY had a good KDA then expect people to be honest with you and tell you that you aren't the next faker.  Seriously man, get over yourself.

> [{quoted}](name=Randomonium,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0002000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-23T00:24:44.643+0000)
>
> You don't seem to understand the difference between someone being honest with you and someone being a dick.  Would you prefer I lie to you and be like "yeah! You can definitely beat a diamond player!"
> 
> Honestly, what was your thought process making this post?  Did you really think people were going to be like "wow!  You're an amazing Warwick.  You definitely deserved an S!  Teach me your ways senpai!"  Wake up, this is real life.  If you come in with the straight up arrogance to think you deserve an S when you ONLY had a good KDA then expect people to be honest with you and tell you that you aren't the next faker.  Seriously man, get over yourself.

You don't seem to understand you're completely misconstruing the situation because it suits your needs. Good fucking bye.

git gud son

guaranteed I could have gotten that S+ on WW boi

> [{quoted}](name=463,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=000200000001,timestamp=2016-12-22T23:17:08.805+0000)
>
> git gud son
> 
> guaranteed I could have gotten that S+ on WW boi

do it, prove it same game time +/- 2 minutes w/ screenshot, or stfu and apologize like you should

Your overall damage was very low. Your wards placed are extremely low (forgiving the fact this looks like bronze V, nobody else warded either).
Your jungle CS is awful, gold income is not that great for the game length, despite also being best on the team.

Your performance is matched against other player averages, not just some arbitrary number, and K/D ratio is not a very big part of the results. 

Also you look like one of those ADC mains that always builds attack speed as a first item, despite that making absolutely no sense. Learn to CS properly and get that BFS first back.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=rbFilgY3,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-22T22:57:26.189+0000)
>
> Your overall damage was very low. Your wards placed are extremely low (forgiving the fact this looks like bronze V, nobody else warded either).
> Your jungle CS is awful, gold income is not that great for the game length, despite also being best on the team.
> 
> Your performance is matched against other player averages, not just some arbitrary number, and K/D ratio is not a very big part of the results. 
> 
> Also you look like one of those ADC mains that always builds attack speed as a first item, despite that making absolutely no sense. Learn to CS properly and get that BFS first back.

That's exactly what I mean though, you're tearing me apart for zero reason. My main point is the kda isn't worth jack and RITO fucked up the whole mastery system... which they did. And it is kdA not k/d.  What kind of people jump on someone they don't know with such outright fallacies and assumptions?
